subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The P.G.A. Championship winner Keegan Bradley held off the Masters winner Charl Schwartzel to win the P.G.A. Grand Slam of Golf by one shot in Southampton, Bermuda.
snippet: The P.G.A. Championship winner Keegan Bradley held off the Masters winner Charl Schwartzel to win the P.G.A. Grand Slam of Golf by one shot in Southampton, Bermuda.
